tooltip.arcana.build_bridge_scroll.spell: Build a bridge back to the target.
tooltip.arcana.build_nether_portal_scrol: Build a Nether portal on top of the target.
tooltip.arcana.build_pillar_scroll.spell: Build a pillar on top of the target.
tooltip.arcana.build_platform_scroll.spe: Build a platform on top of the target.
tooltip.arcana.build_stairs_scroll.spell: Build stairs on top of the target.
tooltip.arcana.build_wall_scroll.spell_d: Build a wall on top of the target.
Annihilate life within the targeted area.
tooltip.arcana.cast_bloom_scroll.spell_d: Make the earth flourish within the targeted area.
tooltip.arcana.cast_destruction_scroll.s: Cast a ball of fire at the target.
tooltip.arcana.cast_flood_scroll.spell_d: Flood the targeted area with water.
tooltip.arcana.cast_wrath_scroll.spell_d: Cast a bolt of lightning upon the target.
tooltip.arcana.cast_clarity_scroll.spell: Clear the user of ill effects.
tooltip.arcana.cast_aura_scroll.spell_de: Create a protective aura around the user.
tooltip.arcana.cast_withering_scroll.spe: Excerpt the life essence of the target.
tooltip.arcana.cast_warp_scroll.spell_de: Warp the user to the targeted location.
tooltip.arcana.cast_loop_scroll.spell_de: Warp time to the next day.
tooltip.arcana.cast_pocket_dimension_scr: Open the pocket dimension of the user.
tooltip.arcana.cast_propulsion_scroll.sp: Propel the user in the direction they are looking.
tooltip.arcana.cast_vacuum_scroll.spell_: Create a vacuum in the targeted area.
tooltip.arcana.invoke_blaze_scroll.spell: Summon a blaze to fight for you.
tooltip.arcana.invoke_ghast_scroll.spell: Summon a ghast to fight for you.
Summon an iron golem to fight for you.
Summon a snow golem to fight for you.
tooltip.arcana.invoke_undead_scroll.spel: Summon an undead to fight for you.
tooltip.arcana.invoke_villager_scroll.sp: Summon a villager to fight for you.
tooltip.arcana.invoke_wolf_scroll.spell_: Summon a wolf to fight for you.
